snippet.title: Light -Game PV
snippet.description: Explore a haunted house, shadowy forests, and ominous roads with a flashlight in "Light," a horror game. Solve random, terrifying mysteries in a night-shrouded environment. Experience dynamic horror, immersive sound effects, and mystery solving. Can you escape the darkness?
